title: 10/1 - Very Spacious Studio w/ Alcove in Allston/Brighton! (*No Fee*)
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 302149145', 'Rent: $1,725 / Month', 'Beds: 0', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 10/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Allowed', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot/Cold Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Available for an Oct 1st move-in!', '**', "No Broker's Fee!", 'Low Move-in Costs for well-qualified applicants **', 'Gorgeous!', 'Super Spacious Studio Alcove apartment located on the 1st floor of a quiet, professionally managed building on Woodstock Ave, located just around the corner from Brighton, and a short walk to Brookline.', 'The B-Line at Allston St Station, located on Commonwealth Ave is just 4 minutes walking distance.', 'The apartment features hardwood flooring throughout, an enormous living space with bay windows, a walk-in closet, and an alcove large enough to fit a queen-size bed.', 'There is a spacious foyer with a large closet and space for a desk, a nice sized kitchen with newer appliances and cabinets, and a good-sized bathroom with a classic clawfoot tub.', 'The rent includes heat and hot/cold water, and there are laundry facilities in the building.', "- No Broker's Fee!", '- Professionally Managed', '- Cat-Friendly', '- 4-minute walk to the B Line at the Allston St Station', '- 8-minute walk to Whole Foods Market', '- Free on-street parking with a residential sticker (Some streets do not require a permit)', '- There is off-street parking available for $195/month', '- Car sharing is available from Zipcar, RelayRides, and Hertz On Demand.', '- Includes heat and hot/cold water', '- Laundry in the building', 'Train Lines', 'B-Line (Green) (0.10 mi)', 'C-Line (Green) (0.40 mi)', 'Bus Lines', '65 Bus - Brighton - Kenmore (0.40 mi)', '66 Bus - Harvard - Dudley via Allston (0.40 mi)', '51 Bus - Reservoir - Forest Hills (0.40 mi)', '57 Bus - Watertown Yard - Kenmore (0.40 mi)', '57A Bus - Oak Square - Kenmore (0.40 mi)', '501 Bus - Brighton - Downtown Boston (0.40 mi)', '503 Bus - Brighton - Copley (0.40 mi)', 'null']
